titleInfo.title: Jimmy Lynch at the Hollywood Ballroom

mods.abstract: One color half sheet (split fountain, red to black, on white) announcing the Jimmy Lynch Show of '70 starring Jimmy Lynch, Mr. Motion, Soil Bros., the Funky Tramp, and the Boss Players at the Hollywood Ballroom on November 6 and 7. Poster features metal photoplates of Jimmy Lynch, Soil Brothers, the Funky Tramp, and the Boss Players.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
